sections.paragraph: 1. to protect or keep by covering, to preserve
2. to cover over with silence; to keep secret; to hide, conceal
3. to keep off something which threatens, to bear up against, hold out against, and so to endure, bear, forbear
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4721; to roof over, that is, (figuratively) to cover with silence (endure patiently): - (for-) bear, suffer.
